EmailTemplate.description: Last notification to budget owner to unlock the agreement
EmailTemplate.name: CPQ Last Notification To Budget Owner For Unlocking
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Apttus_Proposal__Proposal_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Budget_Checked_Out_By__c},
Your budget has been opened and locked for more than 6 hours, the system will automatically unlock and close your budget in the next 15 mins, all changes will not be saved. Please ensure that you have Saved & Attached your working budget.
Thank you
